books.title: The Silent Patient
books.author: Alex Michaelides
books.about: Alicia Branson, a famous painter, is accused of murdering her husband, the photographer Gabriel Branson. From that moment on, she does not utter a word, nor does she say anything in her trial. The only element in which she expresses herself is the quick completion of a self-portrait painting, and the writing of its title: Alcestis. In light of her behavior, the court decides that Alicia is crazy and should be hospitalized in a mental institution.
